mapper.insert: insert into knowledge_point_to_question (knowledge_point_id, question_id, creator_id) values ( #{knowledgePointId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
